Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Southbound Reroute near South Chicago/Greenwood
ShortDescription: Southbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via South Chicago, 75th, Greenwood and 75th: due to, street blockage near South Chicago/Greenwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via South Chicago, 75th, Greenwood, 75th and over regular route: due to, street blockage near South Chicago/Greenwood.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Northbound Reroute near Ashland/90th
ShortDescription: NB 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 95th, Vincennes, 87th & Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/90th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 95th, Vincennes, 87th, then resume their normal route on Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/90th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th BOUND trains bypassing Ceramak
ShortDescription: 95th bound Red line trains will bypass Cermak  due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th bound Red line trains will bypass Cermak  due to police activity. 

We apologize for the inconvenience, updates will follow shortly.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Cermak
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at Cermak-Chinatown due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at Cermak-Chinatown due to police activity. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
